descriptionText.attr1: The secondary base of the Reborn pirate faction.

The Reborn are made up of mostly former MU rebels that didn't heed the call to unify against the Outsiders. Soon after establishing bases this faction drew in what is left of the Digger pirates, and even some TSF deserters. Those that don't quite want to 'give peace a chance' and those left over with nothing better to do.
Their goal is unchanged form the MU rebellion, the total control over this area of space. Not through an all out assault, but through gaining power via recruitment and piracy.
